channel.title: Pk point help
channel.description: Okay, so i added my shop..It has the items, i've also added the pk point system. When i buy an item from the shop, it accepts the pk points but it also accept coins, so if you have 0 pk points you can buy the items either way..Any help?

item.title: Pk point help
item.dc:creator: @I_r_Pwn_u I r Pwn u
item.description:
@I_r_Pwn_u wrote:

Can you tell me one please? :S

Read full topic

item.title: Pk point help
item.dc:creator: @Sage_Mode Sage Mode
item.description:
@Sage_Mode wrote:

Make it a command instead for example say ur reward is dclaws, u cud type ::dclaws but it would cost #### pk pts. Its like the pickup+pay command in some 508 sources and 317s.

Read full topic
